item.title: Do you want to Inspire the next generation of Engineers?
item.description: Attention, Freshmen and Sophomores! Applications are now open for the Engineering Ambassadors! This group has a passion for K-12 Educational Outreach and works with local schools to promote STEM exploration, making engineering more accessible to a younger audience. Please visit the link to our application. Applications close at midnight on January 23, 2026. Contact Recruitment Coordinator, Katie Titus with questions.

item.title: Annual State Fire Inspections Begin January 13
item.description: The New York State Office of Fire Prevention and Control (OFPC) conducts annual building inspections of all colleges and universities in New York State. This year, inspections of RPI’s academic and administrative buildings will begin on January 13 and are expected to take approximately six to seven weeks.

item.title: TIPA Information Session
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, January 13, 2026 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM - The Technology and Information Promotion Agency for Small and Medium Enterprises (TIPA) in South Korea has an upcoming funding opportunity for collaborations between universities and small and medium size Korean companies with a focus on translation in 12 technology areas. A delegation from TIPA will visit RPI to host an information session on the funding opportunity. Members of the RPI research community are invited to attend.
